issue.title: [JS] Embrace ESM in main arrow package
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14775](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14775). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Instead of shipping both esm and commonjs, we could embrace esm as many other js packages do now and thereby clean up our bundles as well.
